messages.title: The only way to stop the SNP in Ross, Skye and Lochaber
messages.content: Elections in Ross, Skye and Lochaber are between the Scottish Liberal Democrats and the SNP. At the last General Election in 2015 it was a clear contest between Charles Kennedy and the SNP with the Conservatives and Labour trailing far behind in third and fourth place. Vote for Jean on 8th June!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats will oppose Conservative plans to break the triple lock and will ensure that pensioners have an extra £772 a year by 2021.
The Scottish Liberal Democrats will invest in a digital economy for all, not just for the big cities in the central belt.
Liberal Democrats will fight for farmers and crofters to get a reliable system of farm payments and access to export markets.
Liberal Democrats believe that local people do know what is best for our local communities and for the people who live here. We stand up to the SNP's power-grabs.
Local healthcare must be supported. The SNP government have been downgrading rural hospitals across Scotland.

Lib Dems to oppose second independence referendum
